scripts.build:develop: npm run clean && npm run css:develop && npm run js:develop
scripts.build:production: npm run clean && npm run css:production && npm run js:production
scripts.concat: cat public/js/globals.js public/js/lib/*.js public/js/helpers/*.js public/js/modules/*.js public/js/index.js > public/dist/scripts-$npm_package_version.js
scripts.js:production: npm run concat && npm run uglify
scripts.start:develop: npm run build:develop && concurrently 'npm run css:watch' 'npm run js:watch' 'nodemon app.js'
scripts.start:production: npm run build:production && forever stopall && NODE_ENV=production forever start app.js
